How we Engage?

Complete Solutions to Anything in Quality Engineering

vxv

Project-Based Testing

We collaborate on defined projects to deliver focused, high-
quality testing outcomes. Our teams adapt to your workflows,
ensuring speed, precision, and real-world impact.

Staffing

integrate into your teams. Each expert brings Moolya’s
mindset context-driven, adaptive, and outcome-focused.

Managed Testing

We take end-to-end ownership of your testing operations and
quality goals. Our managed model ensures consistency,
transparency, and continuous improvement.

Advisory & Consulting

We help organizations shape testing strategies and mature
their quality practices. Our consulting blends strategic insight
with hands-on experience to drive change.

Execution Leadership

10 years of powering all the top brands in India,
Moolya has come a long way with a passion to
back its claim with execution. Proof in the
pudding.

¢ 9 of the top 10 startups in India trusts Moolya with
its testing

support

¢ Superior Delivery Model with a solid project
governance structure & a test- savvy culture

Innovation Leadership

Being a cross-platform test tech company,
innovation run in its DNA. From Indore to SF,
Moolya incubates the most widely used products
in the testing space. Some of them are -

¢ Bugasura - Everyone's Testing Assistant

¢ Perfachhi - a Pre-Prod Performance Monitoring Tool
for Apps

¢ AppAchhi - Deep Testing Automation
